definitions.definition: The self , especially with a sense of self-importance .
The most central part of the mind , which mediates with one's surroundings.
A person's self-esteem and opinion of themselves.
The individual from whose point of view a family tree or pedigree chart is drawn, or the reference point from whom kinship terminology is relative. (Used without the definite article the .)
examples: the cousin of ego on the father's side

main_definition: The self , especially with a sense of self-importance .
secondary_definitions: ( psychology , Freudian ) The most central part of the mind , which mediates with one's surroundings.
A person's self-esteem and opinion of themselves.

( anthropology , genealogy ) The individual from whose point of view a family tree or pedigree chart is drawn, or the reference point from whom kinship terminology is relative. (Used without the definite article the .)
